Description:
Model
Brand: GIGABYTE
Model: B660M DS3H DDR4


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700

* Dedicated LGA1700 mounting bracket is required.
CPU Type: Supports 13th / 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold, Celeron Processors


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel B660


Onboard Video
Onboard Video Chipset: Supported only by CPU with integrated graphic


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR4)
Memory Standard: DDR4 3200
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 4.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express x16 slot, running at x16
(The PCIEX16 slot conforms to PCI Express 4.0 standard.)
PCI Express x1: 2 x PCI Express x1 slots
(The PCIEX1 slots conform to PCI Express 3.0 standard.)


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: 2 x M.2


Onboard LAN
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps


Physical Spec
Form Factor: Micro ATX
LED Lighting: RGB


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported
Label: Board Gigabyte B660M DS3H DDR4
